item.title: Wavy Backgrounds with CSS & SVG
item.description: Wavy backgrounds have been all the rage in design for the last few years. The following tutorial demonstrates several different ways to create wavy backgrounds with CSS and SVG. CSS Versions Bubble Pattern CSS Bubble The bubble pattern creates an elliptical shape that stretches over the top of the content. It only requires CSS to create the effect. file_type_html index.html <section class="bubble"> <!-- content here --> </section> Use the pseudo-element ::after to style an eliptical border radius to the content.
